nxt.data

Class DataCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.data.DataCenter

  • public final class DataCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to provide a centralized, synchronized location to store the data collected by the various parts of the robot and to enable efficient communication between threads.
    Author:
    Andrei Purcarus
